{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|Callable}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept Callable = ScopeMember&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; Scope&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|Callable}} concept is satisfied if and only if {{tt|T}} reflects a function, including constructors and destructors.
